title: Pure - La Croix 24 pack
description: Pure: crisp, clean, and clear, the blue can is pure, our only unflavored sparkling.

title: Lime - La Croix 10 pack
description: Lime: is as good as it looks, always a crowd pleaser.

title: Lemon - La Croix
description: Lemon: tastes better as a sparkling water, no seeds or soggy fruit floater.

title: Orange - La Croix
description: Orange: the more things change the more they stay the same as this tangy flavor is a fan favorite!

title: Berry - La Croix
description: Berry: hopefully you’re switching to sparkling because it’s berry delicious!

title: Cran-Raspberry - La Croix
description: Cran-Raspberry: a mixture of two great tastes that’s berry delightful with nothing artificial.

title: SmartWater Sparkling
description: SmartWater sparkling will deliver a refreshing combination of pure sparkling taste, carbonation, vapor distillation and electrolytes

title: Grapefruit - SpindDrift Sparkling
description: Bright, tangy Spindrift Grapefruit Sparkling Water tastes unique: lightly carbonated, slightly pulpy, and with a fuller flavor than regular sparkling water and seltzer

title: Mango - LaCroix
description: Mango: another new flavor for 2014, mangos are green on the outside with a slightly red hue on top when ripe, thus the can colors.

title: Apricot - LaCroix 24 pack
description: Apricot: is a 2014 new addition to the family which brings a never-been-done-before flavor to the sparkling water aisle!

title: Pure - LaCroix 12 pack
description: Pure: crisp, clean, and clear, the blue can is pure, our only unflavored sparkling.

title: Pure - LaCroix
description: Pure: crisp, clean, and clear, the blue can is pure, our only unflavored sparkling.
